net.derquinse.bocas

Interface Bocas

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ForwardingBocas, SimpleSkeletalBocas, SkeletalBocas, ZipBocas

    @Beta
public interface Bocas
    Interface for a Bocas repository bucket.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the bucket so it cannot be used again.
      Set<ByteString> contained(Iterable<ByteString> keys)
      Returns the subset of the provided keys that are contained in the repository.
      boolean contains(ByteString key)
      Returns whether the repository contains the provided key.
      Optional<ByteSource> get(ByteString key)
      Returns the object for the provided key.
      Map<ByteString,ByteSource> get(Iterable<ByteString> keys)
      Returns the objects for a collection of keys.
      BocasHashFunction getHashFunction()
      Returns the hash function being used.
      ByteString put(ByteSource value)
      Puts a value into the repository.
      List<ByteString> putAll(Iterable<? extends ByteSource> values)
      Puts some values into the repository in a single operation.

    • Method Detail

      • getHashFunction

        BocasHashFunction getHashFunction()
        Returns the hash function being used.

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the bucket so it cannot be used again. Optional operation, buckets that do not need to be closed ignore this operation. Any operation other than close should throw IllegalStateException. Calling close in a closed bucket is a no-op.

      • contains

        boolean contains(ByteString key)
        Returns whether the repository contains the provided key.
        Throws:
        BocasException - if an error occurs.

      • contained

        Set<ByteString> contained(Iterable<ByteString> keys)
        Returns the subset of the provided keys that are contained in the repository.
        Throws:
        BocasException - if an error occurs.

      • get

        Optional<ByteSource> get(ByteString key)
        Returns the object for the provided key.
        Parameters:
        key - The requested key.
        Returns:
        The object, if found.
        Throws:
        BocasException - if an error occurs.

      • get

        Map<ByteString,ByteSource> get(Iterable<ByteString> keys)
        Returns the objects for a collection of keys.
        Parameters:
        keys - The requested keys.
        Returns:
        The objects found in the repository or an empty map if none is found.
        Throws:
        BocasException - if an error occurs.

      • put

        ByteString put(ByteSource value)
        Puts a value into the repository.
        Returns:
        The generated key.
        Throws:
        BocasException - if an error occurs.

      • putAll

        List<ByteString> putAll(Iterable<? extends ByteSource> values)
        Puts some values into the repository in a single operation. The operation must be atomic.
        Returns:
        The list of generated keys, in the same order than the objects provided.
        Throws:
        BocasException - if an error occurs.
